an4.273:1.1: …pe… Attana ca micchaditthiko hoti, paranca micchaditthiya samadapeti, micchaditthiya ca samanunno hoti, micchaditthiya ca vannam bhasati—imehi …pe….
an4.273:2.1: Attana ca sammaditthiko hoti, paranca sammaditthiya samadapeti, sammaditthiya ca samanunno hoti, sammaditthiya ca vannam bhasati—
an4.273:2.2: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam saggeti.
